yearsOfTrust.label: Years of Trust
yearsOfTrust.subLabel: Guiding pilgrims on their sacred journey since 2015

description: At Al-Qasim Tours & Travels, we understand that Hajj and Umrah are not just tripsâ€”they are profound spiritual experiences that every Muslim dreams of. We are dedicated to making your sacred journey as seamless and meaningful as possible.

With over 15 years of experience, our team of devoted professionals provides personalized care, from visa assistance to premium accommodations near the Haram, ensuring you can focus entirely on your ibadah.

whyChooseUs.description: We don't just arrange tripsâ€”we craft sacred experiences with attention to every detail, ensuring your focus remains on worship and reflection.

reasons.title: Trusted & Certified
reasons.description: Fully licensed and recognized by the Ministry of Hajj & Umrah for guaranteed peace of mind.

reasons.title: Experienced Guides
reasons.description: Accompanied by knowledgeable scholars to guide you through every ritual correctly.

reasons.title: 24/7 Support
reasons.description: Round-the-clock assistance throughout your journey for any needs or emergencies.

reasons.title: Premium Service
reasons.description: Top-rated hotels, comfortable transport, and high-quality meals included in all packages.

reasons.title: Personal Care
reasons.description: Personalized attention to ensure your spiritual comfort and satisfaction.

services.description: From the moment you decide to embark on your pilgrimage until you return home, we provide comprehensive services to ensure a seamless spiritual experience.

items.title: Hajj Packages
items.description: Complete Hajj packages with flights, accommodations, and guided rituals for a spiritually fulfilling pilgrimage.

items.title: Umrah Packages
items.description: Year-round Umrah services with flexible durations and premium stays close to Masjid al-Haram.

items.title: Visa Assistance
items.description: Hassle-free visa processing with expert guidance through documentation and requirements.

items.title: Premium Hotels
items.description: Hand-picked accommodations near the holy sites, ranging from comfortable to luxury 5-star hotels.

items.title: Transportation
items.description: Comfortable and reliable transport between airports, hotels, and all sacred sites.

items.title: Ziyarat Tours
items.description: Guided visits to historical Islamic sites in Mecca and Medina with knowledgeable scholars.

gallery.description: Experience the beauty and spirituality of the holy lands through the eyes of our pilgrims.

testimonials.description: Hear from those who have entrusted us with their sacred journey.

items.name: Ahmed Hassan
items.text: Alhamdulillah, Al-Qasim Tours & Travels made our first Hajj truly blessed. The attention to detail and spiritual guidance was exceptional. They truly care about the pilgrim experience.

items.name: Fatima Ali
items.text: The most seamless Umrah experience. From the moment we landed to our return, everything was perfectly organized. The proximity of our hotel to Haram was a blessing.

items.name: Ibrahim Mohammed
items.text: After comparing many agencies, I'm grateful I chose Al-Qasim Tours & Travels. Their scholarly guide enhanced our understanding of every ritual. Truly a transformative experience.

contact.description: Have questions about our packages or ready to book? Our team is here to guide you every step of the way.

terms.description: Please read our terms and conditions carefully before booking your journey.

content.title: Seat Availability & Booking Confirmation
content.text: Seats are limited and booking will be confirmed only after receipt of the advance payment.

content.title: Booking & Payments
content.text: The booking amount is non-refundable and generally non-transferable. Full payment must be completed as per the company schedule.

content.title: Passport & Documentation
content.text: Passport must be valid for at least 6 months from the date of travel. All required documents must be submitted within the given timeline.

content.title: Price Changes
content.text: Package price is subject to change due to airfare variation, taxes, currency fluctuation, or changes in Saudi government regulations.

content.title: Visa Regulations
content.text: Hajj visas are subject to approval by the Ministry of Hajj & Umrah. The company is not responsible for visa delay, rejection, or government-related issues.

content.title: Cancellations
content.text: After booking confirmation, cancellation charges will apply as per company policy. No refund will be applicable once services are confirmed.

content.title: Flights & Schedule
content.text: The company is not responsible for flight delays, rescheduling, or cancellations due to operational or airline-related reasons.

content.title: Accommodation & Transport
content.text: Accommodation, transportation, or other arrangements may be changed due to unavoidable or operational circumstances.

content.title: Health & Medical Responsibility
content.text: Medical fitness is the sole responsibility of the pilgrim. Any medical expenses during the journey shall be borne by the pilgrim.

content.title: Personal Belongings
content.text: The company will not be responsible for loss of luggage, valuables, or personal belongings.

content.title: Expenses Not Included
content.text: Personal expenses such as shopping, extra food, laundry beyond package, and medical costs are not included.

content.title: Rules & Discipline
content.text: Pilgrims must strictly follow Saudi laws, Hajj regulations, and group discipline throughout the journey.

content.title: Government Charges
content.text: Any additional charges imposed by the Saudi or Indian government shall be paid by the pilgrim.

content.title: Jurisdiction
content.text: Any dispute shall be subject to local court jurisdiction only.

content.title: Booking Amount
content.text: A booking amount of â‚¹20,000 per person is mandatory to confirm the Umrah package.

content.title: Seat Availability & Confirmation
content.text: Seats are limited and Umrah booking will be confirmed only after receipt of the advance payment.

content.title: Passport & Documents
content.text: Passport must be valid for at least 6 months from the date of travel. Submission of all required documents within the given time is mandatory.

content.title: Visa & Government Regulations
content.text: In case of any rule change, suspension, or cancellation by the Saudi government, the company will not be held responsible and the booking amount will be deducted.

content.title: Refund Policy
content.text: The booking amount is non-refundable. Unused services once the journey has commenced will not be refunded.

content.title: Flights & Operational Changes
content.text: The company is not responsible for flight delays, rescheduling, or operational changes made by airlines.

content.title: Accommodation & Services
content.text: Hotel accommodation, transport, or other services may be altered due to unavoidable circumstances.

content.title: Personal Responsibility
content.text: Personal expenses, medical costs, and loss of personal belongings are the responsibility of the pilgrim.

content.title: Group Travel Rules
content.text: Pilgrims must adhere to the group itinerary and instructions given by the group leader or tour manager.

footer.description: Your trusted partner for a blessed pilgrimage. Experience the journey of a lifetime with expert guidance and premium services.
